website_summaries.verdict: A combination innerspring-foam mattress that prevents back pain and provides just enough cushioning to keep stomach sleepers comfortable.
pros: Thanks to its hybrid construction with firm innerspring coils for support, this mattress keeps stomach sleepers aligned
A quilted top and second contour layer provide soft comfort
Additional foam layers ensure support and durability, meaning you’ll be using this mattress for many years
cons: May feel too firm to lightweight sleepers, especially during the break-in period

website_summaries.verdict: An outstanding hybrid mattress with a plush yet firm foam top that offers support for stomach, side, and back sleepers.
pros: For stomach sleepers, this hybrid mattress may be the perfect one
Firm springs provide pinpoint support while the Euro foam topper allows sleepers to sink into comfort
This mattress is lighter than others in its class, making it easy to move around
cons: The back edge sinks down when not supported by a headboard, which can feel disconcerting

website_summaries.verdict: A luxury hybrid mattress that cradles your body, offering support and alignment.

This mattress allows for both cradling comfort and unmatched support
cons: You may notice a slight odor when you unbox it, but this should dissipate in a few hours

customer_reviews.title: Caution

customer_reviews.title: A Hotel-Like Bed
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ever trying out a memory foam mattress and so far so good! Since the mattress is so thick, it really feels like sleeping on a hotel bed. Before I made this investment, I used to wake up in the middle of the night and now, with this mattress, I haven't, which is pretty great. My cat is also addicted to laying on this mattress, guess it's pet-friendly too. It was a big purchase, and there are a lot of confusing options out there, but I can recommend this one—just keep in mind the box is pretty heavy and you will need two people to bring it up more than 1 flight of stairs.

Dreamcloud says Amazon purchases only have a 180 day trial, but at the time I purchase it, Amazon showed the SAME 365 DAY TRIAL. Now I am stuck with a piece of garbage and getting the total run-around from Dreamcloud. Absolutely sickening. Their customer service is just as bad as their mattress!

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
